comment: @Sirhornet @xandvt @TomChivers The handshake ban in football is ridiculous before a contact sport when players tend to hug each other after a goal. And, worse, cant run five yards without spitting.

The numbers of people infected are doubling every few days. The larger the no. of people infected the larger the no. people who will require intensive care. This is likely to place significant burden on the health service. So the concern is appropriate.
@patrick_kidd @xandvt @TomChivers Maybe, but to describe Covid19 as a "cold" rather contradicts the many column inches in the rest of today's paper.
